channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: pyls-flake8 (0.4)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin for the Python Language Server
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-adjustable-complexity (0.0.5)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks cyclomatic complexity and calculates max complexity limit in runtime
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-strftime (0.3.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin which checks for use of platform specific strftime codes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-pytest-fixtures-style (0.0.2)
item.description: A flake extension that checks pytest fixtures
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-cached (0.0.2)
item.description: A wrapper around flake8's cli that uses cache at file level
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-nb (0.3)
item.description: Flake8 based checking for jupyter notebooks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-simplify (0.14.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for code that can be simplified
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pie (0.13)
item.description: A flake8 extension that implements misc. lints
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake82 (3.9.2)
item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co with pyproject.toml support
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-django (1.1.2)
item.description: Plugin to catch bad style specific to Django Projects.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-pytest-fixtures (0.0.1)
item.description: A flake extension that checks pytest fixtures
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tidy-imports (4.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.5)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (1.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-types (1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban type hints.

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8dir (2.5)
item.description: A pytest fixture for testing flake8 plugins.
